Package com.intel.bigdatamem

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Allocatable<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
    an interface to allocate memory resources from any underlying memory kind of storage.
    Allocator<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
    an interface to manage the lifecycle of memory allocator
    DropEvent<KeyT,ValueT>
    A event listener to monitor and post-process an entry's evacuation.
    Durable
    this interface defines the interactive functionalities with Mnenomic core part.
    EntityFactoryProxy
    proxy the restoring of generic non-volatile object fields
    EvictFilter<KeyT,ValueT>
    A listener callback to validate its accepted key-value pair for evacuation.
    MemClustering.AllocatorChange
    an interface of event for CommonAllocator change.
    MemClustering.PerformanceLevelChange
    an interface of event for performance level change.
    MemoryNonVolatileEntity<ALLOC_PMem3C93D24F59 extends CommonPersistAllocator<ALLOC_PMem3C93D24F59>>  
    PMAddressTranslator
    translate persistent memory address for allocator
    Reclaim<MRES>
    an interface to reclaim its memory resource.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotatedNonVolatileEntityClass
    this class managed to generate generic non-volatile concrete object and their corresponding factory.
    BigDataMemAllocator
    manage a big native memory pool through libvmem.so that is provied by Intel nvml library.
    BigDataPMemAllocator
    manage a big native persistent memory pool through libpmalloc.so provided by pmalloc project.
    ByteBufferBackedInputStream
    an input Stream that is backed by a in-memory ByteBuffer.
    ByteBufferBackedOutputStream
    an output Stream that is backed by a in-memory ByteBuffer.
    ByteBufferSerializer
    a serializer class that manages to serialize any serilizable objects from/to ByteBuffer.
    CachePool<KeyT,ValueT>
    This is a abstract CachePool class that is inherited from LinedHashMap class, it extends functionalities of its parent class to support some new features that is usually requried in data caching usage scenario.
    CommonAllocator<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
    an abstract common class for memory allocator to provide common functionalities.
    CommonPersistAllocator<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
    an abstract common class for persistent memory allocator to provide common functionalities.
    GenericField<A extends CommonPersistAllocator<A>,E>  
    MemBufferHolder<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
    holder for a ByteBuffer instance.
    MemBufferHolderCachePool<KeyT>
    This class inherited from abstract CachePool class that implemented all inherited abstract methods.
    MemChunkHolder<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
    holder for a memory chunk.
    MemClustering
    clustering different kind of memory-like media and combine them as a larger memory pool for allocation.
    MemClustering.NodeConfig<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
    configuration for each allocator node.
    MemFile
    a memory file that manages its data on native memory storage.
    MemHolder<A extends CommonAllocator<A>,T,H extends MemHolder<A,T,H>>
    hold a memory kind of resource.
    NonVolatileEntityProcessor  
    SysMemAllocator
    manage a system memory pool as a internal volatile allocator
    Utils
    Utilities for project.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GenericField.GType
    defines the types of generic field
    MemClustering.PerformanceLevel
    performance level categories.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AnnotationProcessingException
    this exception is used for non-volatile annotation processing
    ContainerOverflowException
    this Exception will be thrown once cache pool has been out of space.
    OutOfPersistentMemory
    this is an exception that should be throw once out of persistent memory
    RetrieveNonVolatileEntityError  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    NonVolatileEntity  
    NonVolatileGetter  
    NonVolatileSetter
